Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ARN of the segment. For example, arn:aws:evidently:us-west-2:123456789012:segment/australiaSegment

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of the segment. For example, arn:aws:evidently:us-west-2:123456789012:segment/australiaSegment
